EmailTemplate.name: IRCE Event Followup.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Nice meeting you at IRCE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for taking the time to attend IRCE. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thanks for taking time to speak with our team at IRCE. We hope you had a great time. Our team is looking forward to giving you a personal tour of BigCommerce. We'll be in touch soon to schedule some time with you. Our contact information is below. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have questions or want to schedule time now <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/Event-Demo-Request.html?utm_campaign=Prospects.Marketing Events.2015Q4.&utm_source=irce&utm_medium=event&utm_term=BigCommerceEnterprise&utm_content=followup]]>.
Thanks, The BigCommerce Team ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:ecommerceconsultant@bigcommerce.com]]> / 1-855-884-6610 <[[tel:+18558846610]]>
